body:
Instead of providing the links to the charts/list of the sets of characters for each category, what if one appends the full name of the category after the code in brackets, such that the relevant section of text becomes:

> Go treats those characters in category Lu _(Letter, Uppercase)_, Ll _(Letter, Lowercase)_, Lt _(Letter, Titlecase)_, Lm _(Letter, Modifier)_, or Lo _(Letter, Other)_ as Unicode letters, and those in category Nd _(Number, Decimal Digit)_ as Unicode digits. 

At least that would make searching for current charts/lists easier for those not so familiar with Unicode categories.
